bibl.title: The Dakhleh Tablets and Some Codicological Considerations.
Les tablettes à écrire de l'Antiquité à l'Époque moderne
bibl.author: SHARPE III, John Lawrence

bibl.note: The manufacture and use of the two wooden codices from Ismant el-Kharab (Kellis): one, an incomplete copy of the Cyprian Orations of Isocrates, and the other, a farm account (near A.D. 360).
SHARPE III John Lawrence, The Dakhleh Tablets and Some Codicological Considerations.
Élisabeth LALOU (Éd.), Les tablettes à écrire de l'Antiquité à l'Époque moderne = Bibliologia. 12 (Turnhout, 1992) pp. 127-148, 37 figg.
